Gfal Documentation

1.90

Author:
Devresse Adrien

SUMMARY :

I.Report of the Scheduled changes :

  • The list of changes from 1.X to 2.X are resumed api_change

II. How to compile

  • Compile :
    • follow gfal hello world tutorial to have an etics installation
    • cd CERNgfal
    • ./myautogen.sh
  • Compile tests :
    • Install python >=2.4
    • Install scons ( http://www.scons.org )
    • execute "scons testing" in the CERNgfal dir
  • Clean builds :
    • scons -c
